# hackeRnews

The hackeRnews package is an R wrapper for the Hacker News API. Project
for Advanced R classes at the Warsaw University of Technology.

## Installation and basic setup

The `hackeRnews` package is available on CRAN and can be installed with:

``` r
install.packages("hackeRnews")
```

You can install the development version from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("szymanskir/hackeRnews")
```

The Hacker News API is constructed in such a way that a single item is
retrieved with a single request. This means that the retrieval of 200
items requires 200 separate API calls. Processing this amount of
requests sequentially takes a significant amount of time. In order to
solve this issue the `hackeRnews` package makes use of the built-in
support for parallel requests in httr2
([`httr2::req_perform_parallel`](https://httr2.r-lib.org/reference/req_perform_parallel.html)).

``` r
library(hackeRnews)
```

## Cheatsheet

[![Cheatsheet of the
package](reference/figures/cheatsheet.png)](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/blob/main/cheatsheet/cheatsheet.pdf)

## Examples

### Identify buzzwords in job offers posted on Hacker News

``` r
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggwordcloud)
library(stringr)
library(tidytext)

job_stories <- get_latest_job_stories()

# get titles, normalize used words, remove non alphabet characters
title_words <- unlist(
  lapply(job_stories, function(job_story) job_story$title) %>% 
  str_replace_all('[^A-Z|a-z]', ' ') %>% 
  str_replace_all('\\s\\s*', ' ') %>% 
  str_to_upper() %>% 
  str_split(' ')
)

# remove stop words
data('stop_words')
df <- data.frame(word = title_words, stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>% 
  filter(str_length(word) > 0 & !str_to_lower(word) %in% stop_words$word) %>% 
  count(word)

# add colors to beautify visualization
df <- df %>% 
  mutate(color=factor(sample(10, nrow(df), replace=TRUE)))

word_cloud <- ggplot(df, aes(label = word, size = n, color = color)) + 
  geom_text_wordcloud() + 
  scale_size_area(max_size = 15)

word_cloud
```

![Word cloud of latest job stories](reference/figures/word_cloud.png)

### Check whatâ€™s trending on Hacker News

``` r
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)

best_stories <- get_best_stories(max_items=10)

df <- data.frame(
  title = sapply(best_stories, function(best_story) str_wrap(best_story$title, 42)),
  score = sapply(best_stories, function(best_story) best_story$score),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

df$title <- factor(df$title, levels=df$title[order(df$score)])

best_stories_plot <- ggplot(df, aes(x = title, y = score, label=score)) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_label() +
  coord_flip() +
  ggtitle('Best stories') +
  xlab('Story title') +
  ylab('Score')

best_stories_plot
```

![Bar Chart of best stories with their
scores](reference/figures/best_stories.png)

### Sentiment analysis on two best stories from Hacker News

``` r
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(textdata)
library(tidytext)
data('stop_words')

best_stories <- get_best_stories(max_items = 2)

words_by_story <- lapply(best_stories, function(story) {
  words <- get_comments(story) %>% 
    pull(text) %>% 
    str_replace_all('[^A-Z|a-z]', ' ') %>%
    str_to_lower() %>%
    str_replace_all('\\s\\s*', ' ') %>% 
    str_split(' ', simplify = TRUE)
  
  filtered_words <- words[words != ""] %>% 
    setdiff(stop_words$word)

  data.frame(
    story_title = rep(story$title, length(filtered_words)),
    word = filtered_words,
    stringsAsFactors = FALSE
  )
}) %>% bind_rows()

sentiment <- get_sentiments("afinn")

sentiment_plot <- words_by_story %>% 
  inner_join(sentiment, by = "word") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = value, fill = story_title)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(-5, 0, 5),
                   labels=c("Negative", "Neutral", "Positive"),
                   limits=c(-6, 6)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(),
      axis.title.y=element_blank(),
      axis.text.y=element_blank(),
      axis.ticks.y=element_blank(),
      plot.title=element_text(hjust=0.5),
      legend.position = 'top') +
  labs(fill='Story') +
  ggtitle('Sentiment for 2 chosen stories')

sentiment_plot
```

![Sentiment plot for 2 chosen stories](reference/figures/sentiment.png)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`get_best_stories()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_best_stories.md)
  : Hacker News best stories
- [`get_best_stories_ids()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_best_stories_ids.md)
  : Hacker News best stories ids
- [`get_comments()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_comments.md)
  : Hacker News nested comments
- [`get_item_by_id()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_item_by_id.md)
  : Get Hacker News by Id
- [`get_items_by_ids()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_items_by_ids.md)
  : Get Hacker News by ids
- [`get_latest_ask_stories()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_latest_ask_stories.md)
  : Hacker News latest ask stories
- [`get_latest_ask_stories_ids()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_latest_ask_stories_ids.md)
  : Hacker News latest ask stories ids
- [`get_latest_job_stories()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_latest_job_stories.md)
  : Hacker News latest job stories
- [`get_latest_job_stories_ids()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_latest_job_stories_ids.md)
  : Hacker News latest job stories ids
- [`get_latest_show_stories()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_latest_show_stories.md)
  : Hacker News latest show stories
- [`get_latest_show_stories_ids()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_latest_show_stories_ids.md)
  : Hacker News latest show stories ids
- [`get_max_item_id()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_max_item_id.md)
  : Hacker News item largest id
- [`get_new_stories()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_new_stories.md)
  : Hacker News newest stories
- [`get_new_stories_ids()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_new_stories_ids.md)
  : Hacker News newest stories ids
- [`get_top_stories()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_top_stories.md)
  : Hacker News top stories
- [`get_top_stories_ids()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_top_stories_ids.md)
  : Hacker News top stories ids
- [`get_updates()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_updates.md)
  : Hacker News updated profiles
- [`get_user_by_username()`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/get_user_by_username.md)
  : Get Hacker News user
- [`print(`*`<hn_item>`*`)`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/print.hn_item.md)
  : Print for "hn_item" type objects
- [`print(`*`<hn_user>`*`)`](https://github.com/szymanskir/hackeRnews/reference/print.hn_user.md)
  : Print for "hn_user" type objects
